name: Euclid's Grand Adventure
description: Euclid has lived in the same town all of his life. While it has been enjoyable, Euclid can't help but feel the desire to explore more of his world. After some research, Euclid has found a way to do so. He hears of a legend that describes these powerful orbs that can grant his wish. Now, Euclid has set off on a journey to collect these orbs and see the world.
